parameter.name: loadEventDB
parameter.description: Number of days to preload if scesv is started.

parameter.name: showLastAutomaticSolution
parameter.description: If enabled, the last automatic solution is displayed next to the current solution in the summary panel. If the last automatic solution differs from the current solution it is displayed in red. If both solutions match it is displayed in gray.

parameter.name: showOnlyMostRecentEvent
parameter.description: If enabled only the most recent event is shown even if an update of an older event is being received.

parameter.name: recenterMap
parameter.description: If enabled, the map is centered around the most recent event event.

parameter.name: enableFixAutomaticSolutions
parameter.description: If enabled, an additional button is displayed which allows to switch back the latest automatic solution. This button triggers an command for scevent to prioritize automatic solutions until the next manual solution is available.

parameter.name: visibleMagnitudes
parameter.description: A list of magnitude types to be displayed.

parameter.name: button0
parameter.description: Label of button0 which triggers script0.

parameter.name: button1
parameter.description: Label of button1 which triggers script1.

parameter.name: script0
parameter.description: Path to a script if button0 is clicked.

parameter.name: exportMap
parameter.description: If enabled, the current map is exported to file. The filename is appened to the parameter list of script0. The script has to take ownership of the file.

parameter.name: oldStyle
parameter.description:
If enabled, the parameter list of script0 is eventID, arrivalCount, magnitude, description.
If disabled, the parameter list of script0 is eventID, preferredOriginID, preferredMagnitudeID, preferredFocalMechanismID.

parameter.name: script1
parameter.description: Path to a script if button1 is clicked.

parameter.name: exportMap
parameter.description: If enabled, the current map is exported to file. The filename is appened to the parameter list of script1. The script has to take ownership of the file.

parameter.name: oldStyle
parameter.description:
If enabled, the parameter list of script1 is eventID, arrivalCount, magnitude, description.
If disabled, the parameter list of script1 is eventID, preferredOriginID, preferredMagnitudeID, preferredFocalMechanismID.

parameter.name: borders
parameter.description: Draw borders in the summary panel.

parameter.name: ignoreOtherEvents
parameter.description: If the event type is either "other" or "not existing" and this flag is true then the event will not be shown.

parameter.name: lonmin
parameter.description: Minimum longitude of initial displayed map region.

parameter.name: lonmax
parameter.description: Maximum longitude of initial displayed map region.

parameter.name: latmin
parameter.description: Minimum latitude of initial displayed map region.

parameter.name: latmax
parameter.description: Maximum latitude of initial displayed map region.

parameter.name: maxDist
parameter.description: Maximum distance in degrees of a POI (point of interest read from cities.xml) to be taken into account.

parameter.name: minPopulation
parameter.description: The minimum population of a POI to be taken into account.

parameter.name: message
parameter.description: Message conversion string that converts a POI into the text displayed under the region label. There are different placeholders that can be used: @dist@, @dir@, @poi@ and @region@.
